name: Untitled Animal Game (Fire Plant Games)
description:
In Untitled Animal Game you play as multiple animals that share symbiotic relationships with each other, presented in a WarioWare type fashion!

Play as a:
Honeybadger & Honeyguide: Knock down & break open a bee hive to share the honey!
Crocodile & Plover: Eat some taters as the crocodile, & clean the teeth of your friend and feed yourself as the Plover!
Buffalo & Egret: Play in the mud as the buffalo & eat up the insects as the Egret!
Ostrich & Zebra: Smell out paths for the Zebra, and look out for the Ostrich! Use the number keys on your keyboard! (Not the numpad >.< )

Untitiled Animal Game was made as a submission for the GMTK-2021 game jam following the theme "Joined Together" 

Systems & gameplay programming - Fire Plant Games
Art, Voice Talents, 'Pizzaz' - Indie

* The game was made with the 16:9 aspect ratio in mind. Playing in others may cause visual issues

* The downloaded version works best. The webplayer might have some lag etc.
